pages.index: BrewBoutique - Tea and Coffee Shop About us Contacts Reviews Gallery +91-264-1841528 brewboutique@gmail.com Experience the taste of perfection. From the finest Arabica beans to hand-crafted tea blends, our collection of premium coffee and tea is a journey to indulge your senses. Shop now About us Our mission We believe that the best coffee and tea should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or budget. That’s why we’re committed to providing the highest quality coffee and tea, crafted with love and care, using only the finest ingredients and traditional methods to ensure the highest level of taste and satisfaction. We believe in the power of great coffee to bring people together and we’re proud to be a part of the communities we serve. That’s why we’re passionate about supporting local farmers and small businesses, and we’re always looking for ways to give back to the community that has given us so much. Our Story Our journey began in a small coffee shop in Chennai, the capital of India, where we fell in love with good coffee and passionately pursued every opportunity to bring the best to our customers. Today, we proudly serve our customers from over 200 locations across India and continue to brew with the same love and dedication as when we first opened our doors in Madurai and Coimbatore. BrewBoutique is a local coffee and tea shop committed to providing the best products from around the world. From small batch, artisanal roasts to specialty tea blends, we source the finest ingredients to create a unique and delicious beverage experience for our customers. We support local farmers and small businesses, and strive to give back to the community that has given us so much. Come visit us today and taste the difference for yourself! Frequently Asked Questions If you're looking for a convenient and delicious coffee or tea spot, look no further! Whether you're a regular or just visiting, we're here to make your visit a great one. From our specialty coffee blends to freshly baked pastries, and from our expertly crafted tea blends to our friendly baristas, we're committed to making your BrewBoutique experience unforgettable. What type of coffee do you offer? We offer a variety of specialty coffee blends, including espresso, pour-over, cold brew, and French press. We also offer a variety of coffee roasts, from light and mild to bold and robust, to suit every taste. What type of tea do you offer? We offer a variety of tea, including green tea, black tea, herbal tea, and specialty blends. We also have a variety of tea flavorings and syrups to choose from, such as jasmine, Earl Grey, and chai. Can I customize my coffee or tea? Yes, you can customize your coffee or tea to your liking. We offer a variety of toppings and flavorings to choose from, such as whipped cream, sugar, cinnamon, and caramel syrup. You can also choose from a variety of milk options, such as whole, 2% reduced fat, skim, or almond milk. Can I take my coffee or tea to go? Yes, you can take your coffee or tea to go. We offer a variety of convenient ways to take your drink to go, such as carry-out cups, single-serve cups, or you can even order a full-size coffee or tea to-go in a disposable cup. Contact us I accept Privacy policy Phone +91-264-1841528 Location Magadi Main Rd, next to Prasanna Theatre, Cholourpalya, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560023, India E-mail brewboutique@gmail.com Home Reviews Privacy policy Terms of Use happiness in every cup of coffee
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - BrewBoutique About us Contacts Reviews Gallery +91-264-1841528 brewboutique@gmail.com Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is Brew Boutique's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, brewboutique@gmail.com, and other sites we own and operate. Information We Collect We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so - for example, to provide our services, to communicate with you, or to make our services better. Information You Provide to Us We receive and store any information you knowingly provide to us. For example, when you email us at brewboutique@gmail.com, we collect your email address and any other information you provide. Automatically Collected Information When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our website Improve, personalize, and expand our website Understand and analyze how you use our website Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners Send you emails Find and prevent fraud Sharing Your Information We may share your personal information with third parties to help us use your personal information, as described above. For example, we use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the site. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure. However, we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, we advise you to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please email us at brewboutique@gmail.com. Home Reviews Privacy policy Terms of Use happiness in every cup of coffee
pages.reviews: Reviews - BrewBoutique - Tea and Coffee Shop About us Contacts Reviews Gallery +91-264-1841528 brewboutique@gmail.com Experience the best coffee in town Do you want to know what others think about our coffee? Read what our satisfied customers have to say See reviews What our customers say about our coffee Our customers rave about the quality of our coffee, which is made fresh every day using the highest quality ingredients. They appreciate the unique flavors and aromas that set us apart from other coffee shops. Many of them mention the smoothness and richness of our coffee, which is achieved by using a special blend of coffee beans that are carefully selected and roasted to perfection. We also take great care in the brewing process, using only the finest equipment to ensure that every cup of coffee is perfect. Nisha Singh "The best coffee I've ever tasted! I've never been a fan of coffee before, but Brew Boutique changed my life. This coffee is like nothing I've ever had before. It's so rich and smooth, with just the right amount of bitterness. And the aroma! It fills the whole shop. I'm so glad I discovered Brew Boutique." Rohit Jain "I was skeptical at first, but this coffee is amazing! I never thought I'd find coffee that's so unique and exciting. The taste is unlike anything I've ever had before. It's not boring or bland like regular coffee. It's complex and interesting. I'm so glad I tried Brew Boutique!" Priyanka Sharma "I've tried countless brands of coffee, but this is hands down the best. The quality is exceptional and the prices are very reasonable. I'm so glad I found Brew Boutique. I come here every weekend. I'm addicted!" Our benefits High-quality coffee Our coffee is made fresh every day using the finest ingredients. We source our beans from the best suppliers and carefully roast them to ensure the best flavor. Unique flavors At Brew Boutique, we offer a variety of unique flavors that set us apart from other coffee shops. From classic flavors like vanilla and caramel to more exotic flavors like matcha and pumpkin spice, we're sure to have something for everyone. Comfortable atmosphere Our shop is designed to be a cozy and welcoming space for you to enjoy your coffee. From the comfortable seating to the warm and inviting decor, we want you to feel at home. Friendly staff Our staff are always happy to help with any questions or concerns you may have. From recommending the perfect drink to answering any questions you may have about our coffee, our staff are always here to help. Our cozy shelves Every cup of coffee starts with a visit to our cozy shelves, where you’ll find a wide variety of teas, coffees, and specialty drinks. Our shelves are carefully curated to offer something for everyone, with flavors from around the world and a rotating selection of seasonal drinks. Home Reviews Privacy policy Terms of Use happiness in every cup of coffee
